channel.title: 420 Time Again
channel.description: So, just though I'd ask what people are planning on doing this Sunday? I haven't been able to get my hands on any shrooms, so I'll just be smoking a ton of weed and introducing my friend to the substance. I would go into Toronto and join the big parade, but my parents are somewhat less open minded than I am. Ironic how it's 4:20PM EST as I post this...

item.title: 420 Time Again
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

I actually picked up marijuana this weekend. I smoked about 5 grams of green with my 3 friends while out in the forest Was pretty fun.

Read full topic

item.title: 420 Time Again
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:14, topic:200867”]So how was everyone’s 420?

Today was awesome. Just getting ready for bed now, smoking a 1.4 gram joint :)[/quote]
Mine was pretty sweet, however my friend never showed up with the 5 grams of purple haze I bought off him, so I just had a big joint to smoke. A friend and I went down to a convenience store, and bought 4 of these flavoured chocolate milk things, and the price came to exactly $4.20, so we started laughing hysterically for about 5 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: 420 Time Again
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

I’m going down to Ottawa with a bunch of buddies to smoke weed with a couple thousand people at parliament hill, as well as major’s hill. Also I stopped smoking weed 30 days before 420, so when the time comes I’ll be blazed as hell.

http://youtube.com/watch?v=TABNFpzv2mI


say hi to r2 for me. o wait wrong forum hehehe

Read full topic

item.title: 420 Time Again
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:7, topic:200867”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=265473.msg2194469#msg2194469 date=1208482333]
I wonder what Silver Lining will be doing? He seems to be into some of the more abstract psychoactives.
[/quote]

That’s just because he can’t get any good drugs, has to whip up all these crazy home-made shit.
[me=jme]waits for Silver Lining to brag about trying DMT first. [/me][/quote]That post was just dripping with jealousy. I could care less what a DMT virgin thinks of my drug range.
Also, I’ll probably snort the elfspice on Sunday that I’m preparing for whitecastle. Might as well celebrate, even if I have no fucking idea what’s going on.

Read full topic

item.title: 420 Time Again

item.description:
@jme wrote:

On another topic

Maybe they go on MITB because they smoke weed?

I was here long before I smoked weed. Well, kaitnieks anyways.

item.title: 420 Time Again
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

God i want to go to ottawa for it, but im stuck in Saskatchewan. It’s spose to snow here. So im going to my friends house with ppl and then we’ll hotbox his garage all night

Read full topic

item.title: 420 Time Again
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:5, topic:200867”]Oh, that’s cool. Anyway, here’s a quote from one of the videos Jme posted:

[quote]
MagicMaheu:
i was there, it was fucking great :). but a girl died on front of me…lmao [/quote]

Umm? Hopefully that’s a lie.

I don’t want to get into a drug debate - especially one about marijuana! - but I can safely say I don’t like it and I don’t think that inviting friends to smoke it is particularly responsible.[/quote]
Brendan I stay away from drugs like you, But I think it is fair if Unhandled wants to introduce his friends to it. They have every right to say no. And if they can’t say no because they don’t want to look un cool, well then that is their problem. I’m usually 1 in about 30 people at parties I go to who doesn’t smoke. Its probably not the best idea but I’m still able to say no even when theres so many people around me doing it.

Read full topic

I wonder what Silver Lining will be doing? He seems to be into some of the more abstract psychoactives.

item.title: 420 Time Again
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:5, topic:200867”]Oh, that’s cool. Anyway, here’s a quote from one of the videos Jme posted:

[quote]
MagicMaheu:
i was there, it was fucking great :). but a girl died on front of me…lmao [/quote]

Umm? Hopefully that’s a lie.

I don’t want to get into a drug debate - especially one about marijuana! - but I can safely say I don’t like it and I don’t think that inviting friends to smoke it is particularly responsible.[/quote]
Well that’s a matter of opinion, which everyone is entitled to. I personally enjoy the effects of marijuana, and my friend is interested in them as well.

Too bad all three of my other stoner friends decided to smoke it up in one of their garages, and of course got caught. So no 420 for them.

I wonder what Silver Lining will be doing? He seems to be into some of the more abstract psychoactives.

Read full topic

item.title: 420 Time Again
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:2, topic:200867”]Introducing a friend to weed… lovely.

[quote author=Unhandled link=topic=265473.msg2194411#msg2194411 date=1208481420]
I would go into Toronto and join the big parade, but my parents are somewhat less open minded than I am.[/quote]

The parade’s what, a gay parade or something?[/quote]
Hey, he’s cool with it, but if you want to get into a drug debate, go to the other thread.
It’s a parade to legalize weed, or generally just to get baked in public without getting in trouble.

Read full topic
